example.text: By refusing to comply with my subpoena and turn over the Afghanistan dissent cable, the State Department is now in violation of its legal obligation. If they do not comply, [[user]] is prepared to hold Secretary Blinken in contempt of Congress. [[url]]

I believe that we should be working together, in a bipartisan manner, to have an updated replacement to this AUMF to address the current threat environment, while also keeping Congress engaged with our constitutional responsibilities. But this resolution does not work to that end.
